channel.title: New hitsplats HybridPvP v3
channel.description:
So I've been working on Hybrid PvP v3 FOREVER, and now I want to add the newest hitsplats, I followed asshole-rule's tutorial, Then fixed any errors in the client and every file client sided and server sided is Perfect.
I added the cache pics/fonts to my cache via toms cache suite, but when i look through my cache they don't seem to be there.
Anyways, The problem: Well when I try to run my client the black screen pops up that says "Error loading, try closing your internet browser, etc etc."
Then when i replace my old client files It doesn't happen...
Any ideas? Im new to client ;)

item.title: New hitsplats HybridPvP v3
item.dc:creator: @gitds gitds
item.description:
@gitds wrote:

Error loading? Try to download JAVA JRE.

Read full topic
